00047 //! This is the base class for all the Fields which can be written by a call to<br>Problem::setInputField<br>There are for derived classes for uniform or not / domain or boundary fields.<br>All are supposed to be time-dependent.<br>Each Pb_base keeps a list of references to the Champ_Input_Proto it contains.
00048 //
00049 
00050 class Champ_Input_Proto
00051 {
00052 
00053 public:
00054 
00055   virtual ~Champ_Input_Proto() {};
00056   virtual void getTemplate(TrioField& afield) const=0;
00057   virtual void setValue(const TrioField& afield)=0;
00058   void setInitialValue(const ArrOfDouble& vo);
00059   virtual void setDoubleValue(const double& val);
00060 
00061 protected:
00062 
00063 // Factorisation of functions from different input fields
00064   void read(Entree& is);
00065   void setValueOnTab(const TrioField& afield, DoubleTab& tab);
00066 
00067 // Provide access to similar functions from Champ_base and Champ_front_base
00068 // Used by Champ_Input_Proto::read
00069   virtual void set_nb_comp(int i)=0; //!< calls fixer_nb_comp
00070   virtual void set_name(const Nom& name)=0; //!< calls nommer
00071 
00072   REF(Probleme_base) mon_pb;
00073   bool sous_zone_ok; //!< This fields knows how to deal with a sous_zone
00074   REF(Sous_Zone) ma_sous_zone;
00075   ArrOfDouble initial_value_;
00076 };
